surfit::manager Class Reference

serves file_load, file_save, clear_data and mem_info commands

#include <file_manager.h>

Inheritance diagram for surfit::manager:


Public Member Functions

virtual int load_tag (datafile *df, char *tag_name) const =0
 loads tag with tag_name from ROFF file (if it is possible)
virtual bool save (datafile *df) const =0
 saves memory to ROFF file (see datafile)
